comment: Obama Endorses Socialist Superstar Ocasio-Cortez In the article there is a list of midterm candidates that Obama has endorsed You should stay far away from ANYBODY that Obama endorses. Make sure you DON'T vote for them, but I'm sure most of you already knew that Lol

# ::snt Obama Endorses Socialist Superstar Ocasio-Cortez In the article there is a list of midterm candidates that Obama has endorsed You should stay far away from ANYBODY that Obama endorses. Make sure you DON'T vote for them, but I'm sure most of you already knew that Lol
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / endorse-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Obama"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Ocasio-Cortez")
                  :mod (s / superstar
                        :mod (p3 / political-movement
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "socialism")))))
      :snt2 (l / list-01
            :ARG1 (c / candidate
                  :mod (m2 / mid-term)
                  :ARG1-of (e2 / endorse-01
                        :ARG0 p))
            :location (a / article))
      :snt3 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / stay-01
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :ARG3 (a2 / away
                        :extent (f / far))
                  :source (a3 / anything
                        :ARG1-of (e3 / endorse-01
                              :ARG0 p))))
      :snt4 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (e4 / ensure-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you
                        :quant (m3 / most))
                  :ARG1 (v / vote-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 (t / they)))
            :ARG2 (s3 / sure-02
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (k / know-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 (v2 / vote-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG1 t)
                        :time (a4 / already)))))

# ::snt Stop calling women names.
